Text: A MUST HAVE!  This is a MUST HAVE product for all new moms!  The one thing that sets this product apart from the diaper genie is that this product can use regular garbage bags.  ANY Garbage bags will fit.  The Diaper Genie needs it's own refill bags in order to work and that's just more money that you don't have to spend.  This is easy to work and easy to dispose of the dirty diapers.  FANTASTIC!
